title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Money (But Were Afraid to Ask) (Rebroadcast)
description: The bad news: roughly 70 percent of Americans are financially illiterate. The good news: all the important stuff can fit on one index card. Here's how to become your own financial superhero.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
